system:
note description: "Action sequences for EV_DOCKABLE_SOURCE_I." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2009-06-03 17:11:49 -0700 (Wed, 03 Jun 2009) $" revision: "$Revision: 79073 $"
deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_SOURCE_ACTION_SEQUENCES_I
feature -- Event handling
f_dock_started_actions../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_started_actionsdock_started_actions: ../interface/ev_notify_action_sequence.xmlEV_NOTIFY_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Actions to be performed when pebble is picked up. do if ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_started_actions_internaldock_started_actions_internal = Void then create ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_started_actions_internaldock_started_actions_internal end Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_started_actions_internaldock_started_actions_internal ensure not_void: Result /= Void end
f_dock_ended_actions../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_ended_actionsdock_ended_actions: ../interface/ev_notify_action_sequence.xmlEV_NOTIFY_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Actions to be performed after a dock completes from Current. -- Either to a dockable target or a dockable dialog. do if ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_ended_actions_internaldock_ended_actions_internal = Void then create ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_ended_actions_internaldock_ended_actions_internal end Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_ended_actions_internaldock_ended_actions_internal ensure not_void: Result /= Void end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_dock_started_actions_internal../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_started_actions_internaldock_started_actions_internal: detachable ../interface/ev_notify_action_sequence.xmlEV_NOTIFY_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Implementation of once per object ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_started_actionsdock_started_actions. note option: stable attribute end
f_dock_ended_actions_internal../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_ended_actions_internaldock_ended_actions_internal: detachable ../interface/ev_notify_action_sequence.xmlEV_NOTIFY_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Implementation of once per object ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_action_sequences_i.xml#f_dock_ended_actionsdock_ended_actions. note option: stable attribute end
